movies.title: Bey Yaar
movies.plot: In the desperation to earn quick money, two best friends put their moral values at stake and end up losing their pride and dignity. They then choose a wrong path to set things right and snatch back what was rightfully theirs.
movies.simplePlot: In the desperation to earn quick money, two best friends put their moral values at stake and end up losing their pride and dignity. They then choose a wrong path to set things right and snatch back what was rightfully theirs.

biography.bio: Darshan Jariwala was born on September 29, 1958 in Bombay, State of Bombay, India. He is an actor, known for Kahaani (2012), Million Dollar Arm (2014) and Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani (2009).
biography.name: Darshan Jariwala

biography.bio: Manoj Joshi is an India film and television actor. Joshi began his career in Marathi theatre, also putting up performances in Gujarati and Hindi theatre. He has also acted in over 60 films since 1998, many of his roles being comedic. His earliest well known serials include Chanakya, Ek Mahal Ho Sapno Ka, Rau (Marathi), Sangdil, Kabhi Souten Kabhi Saheli, Khichdi (Occasional), Mura Raska Mai La (Marathi). This was followed by film roles in Sarfarosh (SI Bajju) alongside his brother who played the well known Bala Thakur in the film. Joshi's break came as a comedian in the priyadarshan flick Hungama which was followed by Hulchul, Dhoom, Bhagam Bhag, Phir Hera Pheri, Chup Chup Ke, Bhool Bhulaiyaa, and Billo Barber. Manoj Joshi is also in the Star Plus series Gulaal. His father is Navneet Joshi, and his younger brother was late actor Rajesh Joshi (d. 1998). Manoj Joshi hails from Adapodara Village, Near from Himatnagar City, District Sabarkantha, Gujarat.
biography.name: Manoj Joshi

biography.bio: Aarti Patel is an actress, known for Bey Yaar (2014) and Mission Mummy (2016).
biography.name: Aarti Patel

biography.bio: Amit Mistry is an actor and director, known for Ek Chalis Ki Last Local (2007), Bey Yaar (2014) and Shor in the City (2010).
biography.name: Amit Mistry

biography.bio: Kavin Dave is an actor, known for I Hate Luv Storys (2010), Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum (2012) and Mumbai Meri Jaan (2008).
biography.name: Kavin Dave

biography.bio: Divyang Thakkar is an actor, known for Bey Yaar (2014), Kevi Rite Jaish (2012) and Chanakya Speaks (2012).
biography.name: Divyang Thakkar

biography.bio: Prateek Gandhi is an actor, known for Bey Yaar (2014), Yours Emotionally! (2006) and Wrong Side Raju (2016).
biography.name: Prateek Gandhi

biography.bio: Samvedna Suwalka is an Indian Film and Theatre actress popularly known for her Gujarati film Bey Yaar. She has acted in numerous short films. Samvedna is a trained classical dancer and has studied medicine. After studying acting for two years from Robert Reece, Samvedna has been actively doing theatre, films & ads and is a known face in Gujarati regional cinema.
biography.name: Samvedna Suwalka

biography.bio: Sonal Ambani is an actress, known for Bey Yaar (2014).
biography.name: Sonal Ambani

biography.bio: Hardik Aswani is known for his work on 1-800-SOO-LATE (2017), Alison's Decision (2017) and Shoe Kid Stick (2016).
